name: Ear Train-A-Tizer - Ear Training Game
description:
The Ear Train-A-Tizer Ear Training Game by CalebHugo.com is a fun way to learn or practice identifying intervals.

Hit PLAY to play through the levels, guessing the intervals that are thrown at you with increasing difficulty. The game is great for beginners and gives a challenge to experts. Can you beat it? It will surprise you how much fun it can be to get to new levels.

Or open up the app and enable any intervals you wish to create your own custom practice level. Choose to have the sounds play in harmonic or melodic and practice the hardest combinations to hone your skills.

Hit the Learn button to just be able to tap on some intervals and hear what they sound like and see helpful descriptions of them.

Eventually you will be able to play through the levels building a great streak of correct guesses and shooting your score through the roof!

Learn to identify intervals with this great ear training game!

Visit calebhugo.com to play online and learn more about identifying intervals.
